fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Contact a dead Twilight player at night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
From then on, the targeted player will be able to continue to talk in the factional Twilight chat and will be able to use their ability through Esmeâ€™s body, meaning that Esme will be the one visiting.
If the chosen player uses their ability through Esme for the third time, Esme dies.
Vampire Fixation: If Esme dies while a Vampire Fixation is active, all members gain roleblock and redirect immunity along with Basic Defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take out all who disturb this terrible romance
